title: A Newly Built House For Sale-meepawela
details: This House Is Situated At Poddala, Meepawela, Just 300 Meters Behind The Amarasooriya School. Its Planned To Build Two Storied, But First Floor Not Completed. Ground Floor Has Two Bed Rooms, Kitchen And Pantry, Bathroom. And Living Area. A Big Car Porch Polish Roof And All Floors Tiled. 20 Perches Land Water And Electricity Direct Access To The House Many Bus Services Baddegama-galle
